channel.title: Adding barrows drops
channel.description:
So it seemed like it would be basic to me, which I'm sure it really is. There is already a full barrows mini game, but I wanted to add a good chance of a drop while killing the brothers themselves. I told it to have a 75% (for testing) chance of dropping each of the four barrows items that corresponds to the barrows brother. While killing each one, I would find 4 planted pots that were called dragonfire shields, weildable, wrong image, and obviously the wrong drop. What am i doing wrong? [code=java] //dharoks npcdrop = 2026 1 4716 75 npcdrop = 2026 1 4718 75 npcdrop = 2026 1 4720 75 npcdrop = 2026 1 4722 75 //veracs
npcdrop = 2030 1 4753 75 npcdrop = 2030 1 4755 75 npcdrop = 2030 1 4757 75 npcdrop = 2030 1 4759 75 //guthans npcdrop = 2027 1 4724 75 npcdrop = 2027 1 4726 75 npcdrop = 2027 1 4728 75 npcdrop = 2027 1 4730 75 //torags npcdrop = 2029 1 4745 75 npcdrop = 2029 1 4747 75 npcdrop = 2029 1 4749 75 npcdrop = 2029 1 4751 75 //karils npcdrop = 2028 1 4732 75 npcdrop = 2028 1 4734 75 npcdrop = 2028 1 4736 75 npcdrop = 2028 1 4738 75 //ahrims npcdrop = 2025 1 4708 75 npcdrop = 2025 1 4710 75 npcdrop = 2025 1 4712 75 npcdrop = 2025 1 4714 75
[/code]

item.title: Adding barrows drops
item.dc:creator: @gnomez gnomez
item.description:
@gnomez wrote:

claws did you not read that “(HOWMANYTIMES!)*/” that would be the chance
and if you read the 2nd post i said it says percent

and i thought u said this is what you did

2026 1 4716 75

since thats whats in the post?

i said do this one

2026 4716 1 75

change the 2nd and 3rd ones and it still doesent work?

Read full topic

item.title: Adding barrows drops
item.dc:creator: @allisgood888 allisgood888
item.description:
@allisgood888 wrote:

[quote=“gnomez, post:7, topic:374601”]you wanted to know what you where doing wrong and we did answer
npc item ammount percent
npcdrop = 2026 1 4716 75

do this
npcdrop = 2026 4716 1 75[/quote]

Except that is EXACTLY WHAT I DID!

Read full topic

item.title: Adding barrows drops
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“gnomez, post:4, topic:374601”]ohhh
it goes like this

/npcdrop = (NPCID) (ITEMID) (ITEMAMOUNT) (HOWMANYTIMES!)/

so your making npc 2026 drop item 1 and then the 4 is cause the first number is 4716? i guess if thats not it i have no clue[/quote]

Your an idiot. The last number is the chance of it being dropped

Read full topic

item.title: Adding barrows drops
item.dc:creator: @gnomez gnomez
item.description:
@gnomez wrote:

you wanted to know what you where doing wrong and we did answer
npc item ammount percent
npcdrop = 2026 1 4716 75

do this
npcdrop = 2026 4716 1 75

item.title: Adding barrows drops
item.dc:creator: @allisgood888 allisgood888
item.description:
@allisgood888 wrote:

Yes and no, its not guarenteed, its a drop rate, not fixed. But why are you guys posting all this instead of actually answering lol

Read full topic

item.title: Adding barrows drops
item.dc:creator: @Mr_x1 Mr...x..
item.description:
@Mr_x1 wrote:

Are you sure there is a “tab” between each one?

EDIT:
Its : npcdrop = (NPCID) (ITEMID) (ITEMAMOUNT) (%) … out of 100 so if u put 10. and you killed the npc 10 times … you would get 1
oorr if you killed 100 times u would get 10 drops

Read full topic

item.title: Adding barrows drops
item.dc:creator: @gnomez gnomez
item.description:
@gnomez wrote:

ohhh
it goes like this

/npcdrop = (NPCID) (ITEMID) (ITEMAMOUNT) (HOWMANYTIMES!)/

so your making npc 2026 drop item 1 and then the 4 is cause the first number is 4716? i guess if thats not it i have no clue

item.title: Adding barrows drops
item.dc:creator: @gnomez gnomez
item.description:
@gnomez wrote:

your probably just using wrong item ids
if you got the ids off another server ids can change your best to look in your class8.java for the items or look in your item.cfg

try these
4716
4440
4880

if those dont work look in your item.cfg

Read full topic

item.title: Adding barrows drops
item.dc:creator: @allisgood888 allisgood888
item.description:
@allisgood888 wrote:

So it seemed like it would be basic to me, which I’m sure it really is. There is already a full barrows mini game, but I wanted to add a good chance of a drop while killing the brothers themselves. I told it to have a 75% (for testing) chance of dropping each of the four barrows items that corresponds to the barrows brother. While killing each one, I would find 4 planted pots that were called dragonfire shields, weildable, wrong image, and obviously the wrong drop. What am i doing wrong?

//dharoks
npcdrop = 2026	1	4716	75
npcdrop = 2026	1	4718	75
npcdrop = 2026	1	4720	75
npcdrop = 2026	1	4722	75
//veracs

npcdrop = 2030	1	4753	75
npcdrop = 2030	1	4755	75
npcdrop = 2030	1	4757	75
npcdrop = 2030	1	4759	75
//guthans
npcdrop = 2027	1	4724	75
npcdrop = 2027	1	4726	75
npcdrop = 2027	1	4728	75
npcdrop = 2027	1	4730	75
//torags
npcdrop = 2029	1	4745	75
npcdrop = 2029	1	4747	75
npcdrop = 2029	1	4749	75
npcdrop = 2029	1	4751	75
//karils
npcdrop = 2028	1	4732	75
npcdrop = 2028	1	4734	75
npcdrop = 2028	1	4736	75
npcdrop = 2028	1	4738	75
//ahrims
npcdrop = 2025	1	4708	75
npcdrop = 2025	1	4710	75
npcdrop = 2025	1	4712	75
